ch0021_90_green/0101_0701_02_10:
You’ve kept me waiting long enough. C’mon, let’s
get going!
ch0021_90_green/7101_0701_01_10:
Now that I’m a Neo Champion, I’m gonna kick up
a HUGE storm!
ch0021_90_green/7101_0701_02_10:
Better watch out! Don’t get too scared when we
come at you with our roaring thunder!
ch0021_90_green/7102_0701_01_10: Once the Kanto power plant was down...
ch0021_90_green/7102_0701_02_10:
It was a real pain in the neck. I couldn’t listen to
the radio or ride the magnet train in Saffron City!
ch0021_90_green/7103_0701_01_10:
You might already know this, but Red, Leaf, and I
all left Pallet Town to start our journeys at the
same time.
ch0021_90_green/7103_0701_02_10:
Even if our start was the same, we all took
different paths.
ch0021_90_green/7103_0701_03_10:
You can tell from our battle styles. The Pokémon,
moves, and tactics we use are all different.
ch0021_90_green/7103_0701_04_10:
It’s interesting how you can see a Trainer’s life
in the way they battle.
ch0021_90_green/7104_0701_01_10:
Whoa, careful. Don’t get too close to me
right now.
ch0021_90_green/7104_0701_02_10:
I was just petting Zapdos, so I’ve got a lot of
built-up static electricity. If you get too close,
you might get shocked!
ch0021_90_green/7105_0701_01_10:
Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. What do you
think of my outfit?
ch0021_90_green/7105_0701_02_10: Personally, I think it’s pretty awesome.
ch0021_90_green/7105_0701_03_10: It’s perfect for me and Zapdos!
ch0021_90_green/1701_0702_01_10: Find a use for it and get stronger!
ch0021_90_green/1701_0702_02_10: It’s no fun for me if you’re weak!
ch0021_90_green/2501_0701_01_10: I got really excited when I caught Zapdos...
ch0021_90_green/2501_0701_02_10:
So the first thing I did after that was find Red and
Leaf so I could brag!
ch0021_90_green/2501_0701_03_10: But when I did, I saw...
ch0021_90_green/2501_0701_04_10: they’d also caught Articuno and Moltres!
ch0021_90_green/2501_0702_01_10: I guess we were all thinking the same thing.
ch0021_90_green/2501_0702_02_10:
But...if they couldn’t at least do that, it wouldn’t
be worth being rivals with them!
ch0021_90_green/2511_0701_01_10:
When I wear this outfit, it reminds me of when I
became the Champion of Kanto.
ch0021_90_green/2511_0701_02_10:
At the time, I really thought I was the strongest
in the world.
ch0021_90_green/2511_0701_03_10:
Now that I’ve come to Pasio and seen how big the
world really is, I kinda laugh at my past self.
ch0021_90_green/2511_0702_02_10:
I’ve got the perfect combinations to use with the
perfect partner! And more importantly...
ch0021_90_green/2511_0702_03_10: my trust in my Pokémon is top-notch!
ch0021_90_green/2511_0702_04_10: Hah, maybe I really am the world’s strongest!
ch0021_90_green/3001_0701_01_10:
Bonjour! If you keep snoozing, I’m gonna leave
you behind.
ch0021_90_green/3003_0701_01_10:
Yo! I was getting kinda bored, and now I’m
itching for some competition! Wanna battle me?
ch0021_90_green/3005_0701_01_10:
I start to think about a lot of stuff at night... Like
Pokémon and what’ll happen in the future...
